评论概述: Great Party Blazer! Fit and Style perfect!
评论详情: I was really not sure what to expect, but I needed this for a masquerade party and it was perfect! The fit was purely perfect! The jacket had inside pocket as well as accessible outer pockets. I will be keeping this for future costume or masquerade events!

Jacket looks stylish, but my biggest concern is the fitting. It fits in the chest area, but is a little long in the sleeve, so it will need to be altered. It is lightweight, and comfortable. The color pops and is fun to wear

评论概述: ✨All That Shines Isn’t Silver, All That Gleams Isn’t Gold…🥴
评论详情: We wanted to love this! Purchased as a last minute  change for an event. Shipped quickly. Fit was larger than expected. My son is 36-38, slim muscular build. We purchased a small, definitely could have sized down. Note: Product photo appears black/silver however the blazer is all black. This one goes back…

Bought the jacket to wear while I was announcing for an mma fight promotion. I almost got the Large but saw the reviews saying the sleeves were short so went with an XL but it ended up being a little big in the chest and stomach. It came with an extra button though so I watched a video on sewing a button onto a jacket and just sewed one a few inches over and it fit perfectly after that. Nothing but compliments and all the fighters said they felt like they got announced by Johnny Sins. Lol  Will definitely buy another one for the next event I announce for.
A bit snug with arms folded but overall nice fit. 5'7.5 185lb Homecoming was a hit.

I bought this for a special event my husband and I are going to for his job. He usually wears a medium so that’s the size I got. It turned out to be a little bit short in the sleeves and a little snug in the chest area. Returned it and got a large and it’s perfect. Would definitely buy it again.
Love this new jacket - what a great price

The COOFANDY Men's Floral Party Dress Suit in blue is a showstopper! I purchased the US XXL (Chest 52.4) for my husband to wear at my Graduation banquet.  He hates dressing up, but I had a Blue evening gown, and I go this in blue for him.  It is shiny and flashy, and it fits perfectly. The floral pattern is stylish without being over the top, and the vibrant blue color is just right for standing out at any event. The one-button tuxedo design gives it a sleek and modern look. The material feels high-quality and comfortable, making it suitable for extended wear during parties or dinners.  I even packed it for him to wear on a formal night on a cruise.  He always receives numerous compliments throughout the night.I super Highly recommend this blazer for anyone looking to make a fashionable statement at their next event!
My husband needed a dinner jacket for an after 5 wedding and this was perfect! It looked and felt great. My husband says he felt quite dapper in this jacket!
Excellent and fits true to size .

评论概述: Surprisingly nice!  But Order At least 1 size up
评论详情: My husband wanted to order something flashy as instructed for a gay wedding but this blazer was also a bit more subtle.  We measured carefully and he was between a medium and a large but after reading the reviews I thankfully ordered an xl and xxl.  The xl was a perfect fit and I would say his “true to his size”.  So the sizing chart is at least 1 size too small.It’s surprisingly nice for the price.  He will be wearing it with a black shirt, his black suit pants and a silver and grey tie.  Some of the details aren’t perfect (ie: sleeve pressing off) but for this situation and price point, it’s great.

I ordered the Navy and it looks more purple. I removed the jacket from the bag and noticed the lapels were lumpy and felt sticky and had a dust that I suspect is mold. The buttons are plastic. The jacket looks cheap and gaudy. I ordered another jacket in this same brand that was a beautiful Navy and very classy. The buttons on it were satin covered to match the lapels. No comparison in the two jackets, yet price was comparable. I have no idea of the fit of this jacket. I folded the jacket back up and put it back in its bag and never had hubby try it on. I knew immediately it was going back. Save yourself some time and skip this one.

Bought this coat to wear to dinner on an upcoming European cruise.  The coat is not a fully constructed sports coat.  It is kind of between a sports coat and a light weight jacket.  When you wear the coat it looks like a sports coat.  Very light weight.  Made in China of course.  Bottom line, the coat looks good and is very easy to wear.  The size ran fairly true. Maybe a little bit small. I have bigger arms than usual.  I lift weights and had to go up one size. Got a little bit better fit that worked.  I’m pleased. To get a high quality coat the cost would have been several hundred dollars.
This is the second jacket I’ve purchased. The jacket is nice.  A few threads were hanging when removed from bag. Overall great look.
